title: Update regarding QNTM
story_body:
Quantum Corporation (QNTM) has announced the appointment of Emily Chen as Director of Sustainability, effective immediately. In this role, Ms. Chen will oversee the development and implementation of the company's environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives.

Additionally, Quantum Corporation has launched a new marketing campaign focused on highlighting the benefits of its quantum computing solutions for enterprise customers. The campaign, which began on February 1, 2023, at 09:00 EST, features targeted online advertising and sponsored content on industry-specific websites.

In other news, Quantum Corporation has released its 2022 annual report, which includes an update on the company's ESG performance. The report, available on the company's website, provides details on Quantum Corporation's progress towards its sustainability goals, including a 5% reduction in greenhouse gas emissions from 2021 levels.

Quantum Corporation's common stock, listed on the NASDAQ stock exchange under the ticker symbol QNTM, closed at $34.52 per share on February 28, 2023.
